analysisSummary.title: Prometheus Benchmark Cluster - Elite Player Analysis

eliteMetrics.deepThreatProfile: 32.7% air yards share shows elite downfield role

eliteMetrics.receivingInvolvement: 13.0% target share adds passing game value
eliteMetrics.spikeAnalysis: 10.0% spike rate with consistent 22.8 PPG floor

eliteMetrics.consistencyProfile: 24.8 PPG with no spike games = steady floor
eliteMetrics.uniqueValueProp: Elite rushing production differentiates from pocket QBs

eliteMetrics.balancedProfile: Strong passing with meaningful rushing contribution

strongCorrelations.finding: WRs with 25%+ target share show consistent spike potential
Dual-threat QBs maintain higher scoring floors
Deep target involvement (30%+) creates ceiling games

spikeWeekPatterns.WR: High target share (27%+) and deep involvement (33%+ air yards) drive spike weeks
spikeWeekPatterns.RB: Elite efficiency (5.7+ YPC) with receiving role (13%+ targets) creates consistency
spikeWeekPatterns.QB: Rushing contribution (44+ YPG) provides floor, but spike frequency lower than skill positions

positionInsights.mostPredictive: Target share shows strongest correlation (0.85) with fantasy dominance
positionInsights.efficiency: WOPR (0.78 correlation) better predictor than raw volume metrics
positionInsights.dualThreat: QB rushing yards (0.72) more predictive than passing efficiency alone

benchmarkApplication.eliteThreshold: Players meeting 70%+ of position benchmarks qualify as elite
benchmarkApplication.spikeIdentification: Combined target share + air yards share best spike predictor
benchmarkApplication.consistencyMetrics: QB rushing + RB receiving involvement drive weekly floors
